== Painkulam (627722) ==

Painkulam is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1396 hectares and harbouring 2115 households with total population of 9517 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Shoranur]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 4551 and female population is 4966. Scheduled Caste Population is 1636 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the village is 627722<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 3860 (77.73%)
